text: he manushyo![1] hamane tumhen paida kiya ek nar tatha naaree se tatha bana dee hain tumhaaree jaatiyaan tatha prajaatiyaan, taaki ek-doosare ko pahachaano. vaastav mein, tumamen allaah ke sameep sabase adhik aadaraneey vahee hai, jo tumamen allaah se sabase adhik darata ho. vaastav mein allaah sab jaanane vaala hai, sabase soochit hai
